00004  * @package kata

00008 /**
00009  * type-enforcement class. just base your class on this class
00010  * - dont forget to call parent::__construct() if you override the c'tor
00011  * - member-variables are also protected automatically
00012  * 
00013  * @package kata_internal
00014  */
00015 class kataHardtyped {
00016       protected $___hardTypes = array();
00017       protected $___hardVars = array();
00018 
00019       function __construct() {
00020          $vars = get_class_vars(get_class($this));
00021          foreach ($vars as $name=>$value) {
00022                  $this->_hardVars[$name] = $value;
00023                  $this->_hardTypes[$name] = gettype($value);
00024                  unset($this->$name);
00025          }
00026       }
00027 
00028       function __get($name) {
00029           if (isset($this->___hardVars[$name])) {
00030              return $this->___hardVars[$name];
00031           }
00032           throw new Exception("'$name' is no known property of class '".get_class($this)."'");
00033       }
00034       
00035       function __set($name,$value) {
00036           if (!isset($this->___hardVars[$name])) {
00037              $this->___hardVars[$name] = $value;
00038              $this->___hardTypes[$name] = gettype($value);
00039              return;
00040           }
00041           if (gettype($value) != $this->___hardTypes[$name]) {
00042              throw new InvalidArgumentException("setting '$name' to type '".gettype($value)."' disallowed, is of type '".$this->___hardTypes[$name]."'");
00043           }
00044           $this->___hardVars[$name] = $value;
00045       }
00046       
00047 }
